document_data.caption: A map showing Chop Street and surroundings in the Field Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Chop Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Chop Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Chop Street was located in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]]. It was one of the larger roads found in this section of the Field Ward, running east to west in between the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and [[Gawenknife Street]]. Chop Street was also connected with the [[Fieldway]], [[Stench Alley]], and [[Leanwall Alley]].
